channel.title: Can someone tell me how to switch mage books?
channel.description: ok the problem is, i hold the ancient staff and when i click the mage book to pick a spell its normal magickz is there a way to change it to ancients?

item.title: Can someone tell me how to switch mage books?
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

you ever thought of using the blank slot near the friendly face? lol if you have and you dont want to… min ill look into it if i can find it ill edit this post lol

i cant promise any think, might not be able to find it.

EDIT: Sorry cant find any think, erm but id suggest on the client try searching “ancient” might be able to find the word there on your client… erm… another thing search “(“switch”)” that might be on the server, might not lol.
